General.Name: Financial Street Holdings Co Ltd
General.Description: Financial Street Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in the development and operation of real estate properties in China. The company is involved in the tourism resource development and management, catering and accommodation activities, sales of daily necessities, investment management and consulting, business management, health management, and hotel management. It offers business management consulting, fitness service, auto mechanic, conference services, chinese and western food, and wine. The company was formerly known as Chongqing Huaya Modern Paper Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Financial Street Holdings Co., Ltd. in August 2000. Financial Street Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: Block D, Financial Street Apartment, Beijing, China, 100033
